ans: A timer is implemented because of pomodoro technique. It is a time management method. Time spend on task is break down in to intervals and each intervals is 25 mins, followed by a short break.
As the average person attention span is 25min- 30mins.
For every task is marked complete, the points will be added to the account. It is 15 points per completed task

qns: How to mark task as complete?
ans: Go to task page and click on the task you want to mark as complete.
Go to task page and click on the rubbish bin icon that is at the end of the task you want to delete.
Go to task page and click on the add task button.
Go to Home page and click on the add note button.
Go to Profile page and click on the All notes then click on the rubbish bin is at the end of the note you want to delete.

Go to Profile page and click on the All notes then click on the note you want to edit. It will then pop out a page, which u click on the edit button to edit and to save the changes, click on the save button.
